who
we are

A few words about us & our values.

Welcome to HOMEfix where construction isn't only our passion, it's in our blood. Our foundation is built upon generations of handymen, general contractors and master craftsmen and from the very beginning, we built our business with honesty, dependability, and kindness as three of our six core values.

Having served Colorado Springs and the greater Colorado area now for 15+ years, we have the experience to take the dream home you have built in your mind and turn that into a reality. But our services don't stop there... we can help you with just about anything construction related. From roofing to remodeling. Carpentry to deck repair. We can do it all.

Since the creation of HOMEfix, we have been lucky enough to have carried out over 4,200 projects all over central Colorado.

HOMEfix

HOMEfix is a home remodeling, handyman repair, and roofing company serving the Greater Colorado Springs area, including Monument, Fountain, Woodland Park, and Falcon. Services include kitchen remodeling, bathroom remodeling, basement finishing, roof replacement & repair, solar installation, painting services, drywall repair, flooring installation, siding repair, tile repair, deck repair, custom carpentry, fence replacement, and more!


© 2022 Homefix, All rights reserved.
